title: Was it illegal to profit from health care before the 1973 HMO Act?
subtitle: While there are many arguments to be advanced that legislation has contributed to the expansion of profit insurance companies, the Health Insurance Corporation Act 1973 has been misunderstood in the Mems.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: Before Richard Nixon signed the 1973 HMO Act, access to health care was illegal.
